metadata.title: Seductive Blackjack Adventure
metadata.description: A steamy casino adventure with attractive hostesses and exciting games
metadata.author: Casino Story Writer
metadata.editorNotes: Adult-themed casino visual novel with dart game integration

increaseVisitCount.description: Increase the player's visit count to the casino

beCharming.description: Set charming personality and increase charm points

successfulDate.description: Complete a successful date with a character

badImpression.description: Make a bad impression with a character

perfectDancer.description: Mark player as having perfect dance skills

expertDartPlayer.description: Mark player as expert dart player

successfulDate:all.description: Complete successful dates with all characters

unlockSecretArea.description: Unlock access to secret casino areas

establishCasinoFamily.description: Create lasting relationships with all casino staff

isNewbie.text: You're still learning the ropes here.

isRegular.text: You're a familiar face around here.

lovesYou.text: {character} looks at you with deep affection.

hates.text: {character} glares at you with obvious dislike.

isBroke.text: You're running dangerously low on funds.

hasModestFunds.text: You have decent funds to play with.

canAffordHighStakes.text: You have enough for high stakes play.

canAffordUltraStakes.text: You have enough for ultra high stakes.

isDanceSkilled.text: Your dance skills are clearly impressive.

isNaturalDancer.text: You move like a professional dancer.

isDartSkilled.text: Your dart throwing skills are impressive.

isDartExpert.text: You throw darts like a professional.

lovesYou:elena.text: Elena looks at you with deep love and admiration.

isBusinessPartner.text: As Elena's business partner, you have special privileges.

hasCasinoFamily.text: You're considered family by all the casino staff.

hasSecretAccess.text: You have access to the casino's most exclusive areas.

isUltimateVIP.text: You have permanent VIP status for life.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You step into the casino, and immediately, you're hit with the vibrant atmosphere. The sounds of laughter, music, and chips clinking against each other fill your ears.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You look around, taking in the sights of the various slot machines, tables, and rows of people sitting at the craps table.

conditionalText.isRegular: The staff nods in recognition as you pass by.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You make your way through the crowd until you see a woman standing at the entrance, dressed in a tight red dress. She turns to face you, her piercing green eyes locking onto yours.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: She smirks and walks towards you, her hips swaying seductively.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Welcome to the casino, love. I'm Victoria. I'll be your hostess for the evening.

conditionalText.isRegular: Welcome back! I was hoping you'd return.
conditionalText.isVIP: Welcome back, VIP! Your usual table is ready.

preDialog.speaker: Player
preDialog.text: Thanks, Victoria. It's nice to meet you.

conditionalText.likesYou:victoria: It's great to see you again, Victoria.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Please, call me Vicky. We have so many exciting games here - blackjack tables, a dance club, and even a sports bar with dart boards. What catches your interest?

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Victoria waits for your choice, her smile inviting you to explore whatever the casino has to offer.

choices.text: I'd like to check out the sports bar

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Victoria leads you through a side corridor to the casino's sports bar. The atmosphere is more relaxed here, with multiple screens showing various games and the sound of laughter mixing with sports commentary.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: This is our sports bar and recreation area. Perfect for those who want to take a break from the tables. And this is Morgan - she runs the place.

conditionalText.isCharming: Morgan loves guests with good sportsmanship.

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: Hey there! Welcome to my domain. We've got pool tables, arcade games, and the best dart boards in the city. You look like someone who might have a good throwing arm.

conditionalText.isRegular: Good to see you back in my bar!
conditionalText.isDartSkilled: I can tell you know your way around a dart board.

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: I was actually just about to close up the dart boards for the night, but if you're interested in a friendly game, I'd be happy to play a round with you. I have to warn you though - I'm pretty good!

conditionalText.isCharming: Plus, a little friendly competition never hurt anyone.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Morgan used to be on the professional dart circuit before she came to work here. She's definitely not joking about being good!

conditionalText.likesYou:morgan: But she's also a great teacher if you want to learn.

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: So, what do you say? Want to test your aim against a pro? I'll go easy on you... maybe.

conditionalText.isDartSkilled: Actually, you look like you might give me a real challenge!

choices.text: I'm game! Let's play darts (Easy difficulty)
Bring it on! No holding back (Medium difficulty)
Show me what a pro can do (Hard difficulty)
Maybe we could get some drinks first?
Actually, let's check out the other games

postDialog.speaker: Narrator
postDialog.text: What a game! {result} You scored {playerScore} points with an average of {playerAverage} per dart, while Morgan scored {opponentScore} with an average of {opponentAverage}. Your accuracy was {accuracy}%!

conditionalText.winner == 'player': Morgan looks genuinely impressed with your performance!
conditionalText.winner == 'opponent': Morgan grins confidently but gives you an encouraging pat on the back.
conditionalText.winner == 'tie': Morgan whistles appreciatively - a tie against her is no small feat!

postDialog.speaker: Morgan
postDialog.text: That was fantastic! You've definitely got some skill with those darts. {winner == 'player' ? 'I haven\'t been beaten like that in a while!' : 'With a little more practice, you\'ll be giving me real trouble!'} How about we celebrate with a drink?

conditionalText.accuracy >= 75: Your accuracy was really impressive for someone who doesn't play professionally.
conditionalText.playerScore >= 200: Over 200 points is seriously good shooting!

postDialog.speaker: Victoria
postDialog.text: I'm impressed! You handled yourself really well against Morgan. She doesn't usually offer to play with first-time visitors.

conditionalText.likesYou:morgan: I think Morgan is quite taken with your skills.
conditionalText.isCharming: Your competitive spirit is quite attractive.

postDialog.speaker: Morgan
postDialog.text: You know what? You've got natural talent. If you ever want to practice more, I'm here most evenings. I'd love to help you improve your game... among other things.

conditionalText.winner == 'player': Especially after that performance - you might actually have pro potential.
conditionalText.isCharming: And I have to say, I enjoy the company of someone with your... charm.

choices.text: I'd love to come back and practice with you
That was fun! What other games do you have here?
I should check out the rest of the casino

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Morgan leads you to a quieter corner of the sports bar, away from the other patrons. The lighting is softer here, and you can finally talk without the background noise.

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: You know, I don't usually invite guests to practice with me. There's something different about you - your focus, your natural stance... and the way you handled that pressure.

conditionalText.winner == 'player': Plus, beating me on your first try? That takes serious skill.
conditionalText.isCharming: And I have to admit, your confidence is quite appealing.

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: I used to travel the professional circuit, but I found something here at the casino that's worth more than any trophy. Want to know what that is?

conditionalText.isDartSkilled: It's finding someone who truly appreciates the art of the game.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Morgan shows you her private collection of professional darts and shares stories of her tournament days. The conversation grows more intimate as the evening progresses...

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: That was wonderful. I haven't felt this connected to someone in a long time. Why don't I show you around the rest of the casino? I know all the best spots.

choices.text: I'd love a personal tour from you
Let's check out the blackjack tables

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: What'll it be? We've got everything from beer to top-shelf whiskey. First drink is on the house for anyone brave enough to face me at darts!

conditionalText.winner == 'player': And hey, winners get premium service.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: This is nice! I don't get to spend much time in the sports bar usually. It's got such a different energy from the casino floor.

conditionalText.likesYou:victoria: I'm glad you chose to explore different parts of our establishment.

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: Victoria here usually sticks to the fancy casino floor, but we've got our own charm down here. Good honest competition, cold drinks, and real conversation.

conditionalText.likesYou:morgan: Plus, I get to meet interesting people like you.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: You know what? This gives me an idea. What if we showed you all the different entertainment options the casino has to offer? We could make it a proper tour!

conditionalText.isVIP: Someone of your status should see everything we have to offer.

choices.text: That sounds perfect! Let's see everything
I'd like to try the blackjack tables now
How about that dance club Victoria mentioned?
Let's stay here and play more games

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: Great choice! We've got pool tables, arcade games, and even a few more dart boards if you want another round. What catches your interest?

conditionalText.isDartSkilled: Though with your dart skills, maybe we should try something that'll give me a fighting chance!

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: Or if you're feeling lucky, we could head back to the main casino floor. I'll show you my favorite blackjack table - the dealers there are friends of mine.

choices.text: Another round of darts sounds perfect
Show me around the whole casino

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: Alright, let me show you the casino through the eyes of someone who's worked here for years. I know all the best spots and the stories behind them.

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: First stop - let's check out those blackjack tables where Victoria works. I'll introduce you to some of the other staff. They're good people, and they'll take care of you.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Perfect! Morgan knows the sports and entertainment side, and I know all the gaming tables. Together, we'll give you the ultimate casino experience.

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: And trust me, with both of us showing you around, you're going to see sides of this place most guests never do. Ready for the VIP treatment?

choices.text: Let's start with the blackjack tables
Show me the dance club first

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: This is Rachel. She'll be dealing for you tonight.

conditionalText.isCharming: You'll love her - she's as charming as you are.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: Hi there! Welcome to our table. Can I get you started with some chips?

conditionalText.isRich: I can see you're a serious player - let's get you some premium chips.
conditionalText.isRegular: Back for more action? I like that in a player.

preDialog.speaker: Player
preDialog.text: Yeah, please. And do you have any recommendations for this game?

conditionalText.isCharming: I'd love to hear your expert advice, Rachel.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: Well, the key is to keep track of your hand value. If it gets too close to 21, you might want to hit or stand.

conditionalText.isCharming: But I have a feeling you'll do just fine.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: And don't forget to pay attention to the dealer's up card. That can help you make better decisions.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: Though I'll be watching to help you out if you need it.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You begin playing, focusing on the game as much as possible. As you continue, you can feel a growing attraction between you and Vicky, especially when she helps you out and offers words of encouragement. You also notice that Rachel seems to be flirting with you, but you try to focus on the game.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: It's time to start playing. What stakes would you like to play?

conditionalText.isRich: With your bankroll, you can afford any table.
conditionalText.isBroke: You'll want to be careful with your limited funds.

choices.text: Ask about other activities in the casino

postDialog.speaker: Narrator
postDialog.text: After an exciting game, you've won! {result}. Your current balance is now ${playerMoney}.

winCondition.additionalText: Victoria seems very impressed with your skills.

loseCondition.additionalText: Victoria gives you a sympathetic look.

postDialog.speaker: Victoria
postDialog.text: You played wonderfully! As a special reward, I'd like to offer you a private session in our VIP room. Would you like to join me?

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: I've been thinking about this all evening.

choices.text: I'd like to check out the sports bar again

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Before you continue with more blackjack, Rachel and I have a special treat for you. Our casino has an exclusive dance club upstairs!

conditionalText.isVIP: Only our most special guests get to experience this.
conditionalText.isCharming: Someone with your charm would be perfect on the dance floor.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: We were about to have a little dance competition. Would you like to join us? I bet you've got some moves!

conditionalText.likesYou:victoria: Victoria and I have been talking about how fun it would be to dance with you.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: The music is already pumping, and the dance floor is calling. What do you say? Will you show us what you've got?

conditionalText.isCharming: I have a feeling you're going to surprise us with your rhythm.
conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: I'd love to see you move to the beat.

choices.text: I'm better at card games than dancing

postDialog.speaker: Narrator
postDialog.text: What an incredible performance! You scored a {grade} with {accuracy} accuracy, hitting {perfectHits} perfect moves out of {totalBeats} total beats. {partner} is clearly impressed!

conditionalText.grade == 'A' || grade == 'S': Your dancing skills are absolutely phenomenal!
conditionalText.grade == 'B' || grade == 'C': Not bad for someone who spends more time at card tables!

postDialog.speaker: Victoria
postDialog.text: I had no idea you could move like that! You've got rhythm and style. This definitely calls for a celebration.

conditionalText.partner == 'Victoria': Dancing with you felt so natural and romantic.
conditionalText.partner == 'Rachel': Rachel is right - you're full of surprises!
conditionalText.partner == 'Victoria & Rachel': The way you handled both of us was absolutely amazing!

postDialog.speaker: Rachel
postDialog.text: You really know how to sweep a girl off her feet! That was so much fun. I think this deserves a special reward...

conditionalText.partner == 'Rachel': I loved every second of dancing with you!
conditionalText.partner == 'Victoria': Victoria got lucky dancing with someone so talented!
conditionalText.partner == 'Victoria & Rachel': The way you managed to dance with both of us was incredible!

postDialog.speaker: Victoria
postDialog.text: Since you showed us such an amazing time on the dance floor, we'd like to show you our appreciation. What would you like to do next?

choices.text: Take a break and get drinks

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: The three of you continue dancing as the music builds. The energy is electric, and other casino guests have stopped to watch your incredible performance.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: That was absolutely incredible! I've never had so much fun dancing. You've got some serious talent!

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Let's grab some drinks and catch our breath. That dancing really worked up an appetite for more fun!

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: I love how you can keep up with us.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: You know, between your card skills and your dancing, you're quite the renaissance man. What other talents are you hiding?

conditionalText.isCharming: Your charm extends far beyond the card table.
conditionalText.isDartSkilled: I heard from Morgan that you're pretty good with darts too!

choices.text: How about we head back to the casino?

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: We have a private studio upstairs. Your dancing deserves a more... intimate celebration.

conditionalText.isVIP: This is where we bring only our most special guests.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You spend an intimate evening with Victoria and Rachel in the private studio, dancing to slow music and enjoying each other's company...

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: The night continues with private dances and intimate moments...

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: That was an unforgettable evening. You certainly know how to make a girl feel special on and off the dance floor.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: You're asking for my opinion? How thoughtful!

conditionalText.lovesYou:rachel: I think you should follow your heart.
conditionalText.isCharming: A gentleman always asks a lady's opinion.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: Actually, I think you should spend some time with me first. I promise I can show you just as good a time.

choices.text: Suggest we all go dancing instead

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Rachel leads you to a private dealer's room behind the main floor. The intimate space is perfect for getting to know each other better.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: I'm so glad you chose me. Victoria's nice, but I think we have a special connection.

conditionalText.isCharming: You have such a way about you that just draws me in.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You spend intimate time with Rachel...

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: That was amazing! Now, shall we head back? I'd love to introduce you to more of the casino.

choices.text: Let's explore more of the casino

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Both of us? That's... quite bold of you.

conditionalText.isCharming + isVIP: But I suppose someone of your caliber deserves special treatment.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: I'm game if you are, Victoria. He's certainly earned it.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: The three of you head to the most exclusive VIP suite in the casino. This is a night you'll never forget.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You enjoy an incredible evening with both Victoria and Rachel...

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: That was absolutely incredible! You're quite the man.

choices.text: Let's check out more of the casino

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: After winning the first game, you receive a prize: a private room where you can have an intimate encounter with Vicky. You both head into the room, and once the door closes behind you, Vicky turns to face you.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: She takes a step closer, her eyes locked onto yours.

conditionalText.isCharming: Your natural charm has clearly won her over completely.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: So, how did you like the game tonight? Did you enjoy my company?

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: I've been looking forward to being alone with you all evening.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You spend some intimate time with Victoria in the VIP room...

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Time passes...

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: That was lovely. Now, shall we head back to the casino floor? I'd like to introduce you to another table with some new faces.

conditionalText.isVIP: As our VIP guest, you deserve to see everything we offer.

choices.text: Yes, let's check out the new table
I'd rather stay here a bit longer

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Oh? You want to stay longer? I think that can be arranged...

conditionalText.isCharming: You're quite the romantic, aren't you?

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You spend more time with Victoria...

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: That was wonderful, but we really should join the others now. Let me introduce you to some new games and faces.

choices.text: Let's go to the new table

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Victoria takes you back to the casino floor to introduce you to the next table you can play with 2 new girls.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: Victoria is clearly proud to be showing off her favorite guest.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: This is our high-roller table. These ladies are Sophia and Jasmine. They'll take good care of you.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: He's very special to me, so treat him well.
conditionalText.isRich: He's got excellent taste and the bankroll to match.
conditionalText.isDartSkilled: And I hear he's quite skilled at games beyond the tables.

preDialog.speaker: Sophia
preDialog.text: Welcome to our VIP table. I'll be your dealer tonight.

conditionalText.isRegular: I've heard about you from the other girls.
conditionalText.isRich: A pleasure to serve someone of your stature.

preDialog.speaker: Jasmine
preDialog.text: And I'll be assisting tonight. We've heard good things about your play style. Care to show us what you've got?

conditionalText.isCharming: I can already tell you're going to be fun to work with.

preDialog.speaker: Sophia
preDialog.text: What stakes would you like to play today?

conditionalText.isRich: With your bankroll, any table is available to you.
conditionalText.isVIP: As our VIP, you have access to our premium games.

dealers.name: Jasmine
dealers.eventName: Jasmine's Ultra High Stakes Elite Table

postDialog.speaker: Sophia
postDialog.text: Excellent game! {result}. Your balance is now ${playerMoney}.

conditionalText.isRich: Money seems to follow you wherever you go.

postDialog.speaker: Jasmine
postDialog.text: You've proven yourself at our table. Would you be interested in a private game in our exclusive suite? Both Sophia and I would be your personal hosts.

conditionalText.isVIP: Someone of your status deserves our best treatment.
conditionalText.lovesYou:jasmine: I've been hoping you'd want to spend more time with us.

choices.text: I'd like to check out the sports bar

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You follow Sophia and Jasmine to an exclusive suite on the top floor of the casino. The luxurious room has panoramic views of the city lights below.

preDialog.speaker: Sophia
preDialog.text: Welcome to our private suite. Here, we can play a more... intimate game of blackjack.

conditionalText.isVIP: Only our most special guests ever see this room.
conditionalText.isRich: Money can't buy this experience - but charm and skill can.

preDialog.speaker: Jasmine
preDialog.text: The stakes are higher here, but so are the rewards. Shall we begin?

conditionalText.isCharming: Your charm has definitely earned you this privilege.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You spend the night enjoying the exclusive company of Sophia and Jasmine...

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: The morning light streams through the windows. You find yourself alone in the luxurious suite with a note on the bedside table. It reads: 'We hope you enjoyed your visit to our casino. Come back anytime for another round of games. - V, R, S, J & M'

conditionalText.isVIP: P.S. Your VIP status is permanent - you'll always be welcome here.
conditionalText.isDartSkilled: P.P.S. Morgan says the dartboards are always ready for you!

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: You decided to come back to me? I'm flattered.

conditionalText.isCharming: You always know how to make a girl feel special.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: You know, I was hoping you'd choose me. Let me show you my personal suite - it's even nicer than theirs.

conditionalText.isVIP: As our top VIP, you deserve to see my private quarters.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Victoria takes you to her personal suite, which is decorated with elegant taste and features a stunning view of the city skyline.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: I knew from the moment I saw you that we had a special connection. I'm glad you felt it too.

conditionalText.isCharming: Your charm drew me in from the very beginning.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You spend a passionate day with Victoria...

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Last night was wonderful. I've never connected with a guest like this before. Would you like to stay another day at the casino with me?

conditionalText.isVIP: I could arrange for you to have permanent VIP access if you'd like.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You spend the next day with Victoria, enjoying the casino's private beach and exclusive amenities. Your connection grows stronger as you share personal stories and laugh together.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: That evening, Victoria takes you to the casino's five-star restaurant for a romantic dinner. The atmosphere is perfect, and Victoria looks stunning in her evening attire.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: The way she looks at you makes it clear this is more than just a casual dinner.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: I've never felt this way about someone I've met at the casino. Would you consider staying in touch after you leave? Perhaps we could meet again soon...

conditionalText.isCharming: You've shown me what a real gentleman is like.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Victoria gives you her personal phone number and seems genuinely interested in seeing you again. You feel that your casino adventure has turned into something much more meaningful.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: This feels like the beginning of something beautiful.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: As your plane takes off, you reflect on your unexpected adventure at the casino. What started as a simple game of blackjack turned into something you'll never forget.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: Victoria's face keeps appearing in your mind.
conditionalText.isRich: Your winnings were substantial, but the memories are priceless.
conditionalText.isDartSkilled: You even discovered some hidden talents along the way.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Back home, you find yourself checking your phone often, thinking about Victoria. Your winnings from the casino were nice, but the connection you made was the real jackpot.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: You've never felt this way about someone before.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Your phone lights up with a text message: 'Missing you already. The casino feels empty without you. When can I see you again? -V'

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: Your heart skips a beat reading her message.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You smile as you type your reply, already planning your next trip. Some gambles in life are worth taking, and this was definitely one of them.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: You realize this might be the beginning of the rest of your life.

choices.text: THE END - Start a New Game

preDialog.speaker: Casino Manager
preDialog.text: Thank you for visiting our casino! We hope you enjoyed your time with our lovely hostesses and all our entertainment options. Please come back soon for more exciting games and experiences.

conditionalText.isVIP: As our VIP guest, you'll always have a special place here.
conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: Victoria asked me to give you her personal regards.
conditionalText.isDartSkilled: Morgan wanted me to tell you the dart boards are always ready for you.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: As you leave the casino, you reflect on your exciting night of games and encounters. Your final balance is ${playerMoney}, making your overall profit ${profit}.

conditionalText.isWinning: You came out ahead financially and emotionally.
conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria + lovesYou:rachel: You've made some incredible connections tonight.
conditionalText.isVIP: Your reputation at this casino is now legendary.
conditionalText.isDartSkilled: You even discovered some new talents along the way.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Would you like to play again?

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: Part of you is already planning your return to see Victoria again.
conditionalText.isDartSkilled: You're already thinking about challenging Morgan to another dart game.

preDialog.speaker: NARRATOR
preDialog.text: The casino takes on a different atmosphere late at night. The crowds have thinned, and the lights seem softer and more intimate.

conditionalText.{$casinoReputation} >= 75: The staff nods respectfully as you pass.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: The night is still young, and I know some exclusive areas that only open after midnight. Interested in seeing the casino's hidden secrets?

conditionalText.{$victoriaRelationship} >= 30: I've been saving these special places just for you.

choices.text: Let's check on the other girls first
I'm curious about the high roller lounge
Maybe we should call it a night

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Follow me. There's a private elevator behind this bookshelf that leads to the casino owner's personal gaming rooms.

conditionalText.{$casinoReputation} >= 90: You've earned the right to see these exclusive areas.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: This is Elena, the casino owner. She rarely meets guests personally, but your reputation has caught her attention.

preDialog.speaker: Elena
preDialog.text: So you're the one who's been making such an impression on my staff. I have a special proposition for someone of your... caliber.

conditionalText.{$charmPoints} >= 10: Your reputation for charm precedes you.

choices.text: What kind of special games do you have here?
Challenge Elena to a high-stakes game

preDialog.speaker: Elena
preDialog.text: I'm always looking for investors and partners who understand the finer things in life. Someone with your success rate and charm could be very valuable to my operation.

conditionalText.{$profit} > 2000: Your winnings tonight alone show you understand calculated risks.

preDialog.speaker: Elena
preDialog.text: But business can wait. Right now, I'm more interested in getting to know you personally. Victoria, would you mind giving us some privacy?

conditionalText.{$elenaRelationship} >= 20: I find myself quite drawn to you.

preDialog.speaker: Elena
preDialog.text: Now then, shall we discuss this partnership over a private dinner? I have a penthouse restaurant that overlooks the entire city.

choices.text: I should return to the main casino

preDialog.speaker: NARRATOR
preDialog.text: Elena leads you to a private elevator that takes you to the penthouse. The restaurant is breathtaking, with floor-to-ceiling windows offering a panoramic view of the city lights.

preDialog.speaker: Elena
preDialog.text: I don't often bring guests here. This penthouse is my sanctuary, away from the noise and chaos of the casino floor. You must be very special.

conditionalText.{$isCharming}: Your charm has certainly captured my attention completely.

preDialog.speaker: NARRATOR
preDialog.text: The evening progresses beautifully as Elena shares stories of building her casino empire. The chemistry between you is undeniable...

preDialog.speaker: Elena
preDialog.text: That was extraordinary. I haven't felt this way about someone in years. Perhaps you'd consider a more permanent arrangement? I could use a partner like you.

choices.text: I'd love to be your partner
Let's take this one day at a time
This was amazing, but I should see the others

preDialog.speaker: NARRATOR
preDialog.text: You find yourself in the staff lounge where all the girls you've met tonight have gathered for their end-of-shift meeting. They seem delighted to see you.

conditionalText.{$casinoReputation} >= 50: Your reputation has definitely made an impression on everyone.

preDialog.speaker: Sophia
preDialog.text: Well look who's still here! You've certainly made quite the impression on all of us tonight. We were just discussing what a memorable evening this has been.

preDialog.speaker: Morgan
preDialog.text: I told them all about your dart skills! They're impressed. We were thinking... how about one final group activity before the night ends?

conditionalText.{$dartSkill} >= 70: Your dart reputation has spread throughout the casino.

postDialog.speaker: NARRATOR
postDialog.text: What an incredible performance! Your final score was {grade} with {accuracy}% accuracy. The entire staff is cheering for your amazing finale!

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: We've arranged something special - a private party just for you! You've been such an amazing guest that we wanted to give you the ultimate casino experience.

preDialog.speaker: Jasmine
preDialog.text: This is our way of saying thank you for being such a wonderful guest. Tonight has been unforgettable for all of us.

conditionalText.{$totalWinnings} > 5000: Your success tonight has been legendary.

preDialog.speaker: NARRATOR
preDialog.text: The private party continues late into the night with games, dancing, and intimate conversations. You realize this has been the most incredible casino experience of your life...

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: As the sun rises, we want you to know that you'll always have a home here. We've never met anyone quite like you.

choices.text: Ask them to visit you sometime

achievements.title: Aim for Love
achievements.description: Earn Morgan's respect and training offer
